pages.title: All about me
body:
Hello, let me introduce myself, my name is Ricardo Gimenes Ferreira.
Nice to meet you.

I am a Brazilian computer programmer that works mainly with small websites and blogs, usually developing the whole code in PHP or ASP, as my main backend language, and as you can see, I am not that good with the layout when I try to develop alone, but I am trying to improve.

One of my dreams is living in abroad, leaving Brazil for a while, it is a nice place here, but there are a lot of problems that most other countries have solved, I want to live new problems and come back with better solutions for the old ones, if I come back someday, for now I am dreaming of living in the UK, in London, since I have relatives there it would be an easier start.

My main hoby is playing music, bass is my favorite musical insturment, but I know how to play the jews harp, the kalimba and other small instruments, you can follow me on instagram, facebook or on youtube, I regularly post a few videos of me trying to play these amazing instruments.

Other thing that I like a lot is learning languages and conecting with people, I know how to speak Spanish, English, Japanese, Danish, Dutch, Russian, French, Italian and Portuguese(being my native language), so since I know how to speak those languages I tried to make a multilanguage website.
